author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-185.  Fix so that, if a task tracker times out making the RPC asking for a new task to run, the job tracker does not think that it is actually running the task returned (but never received).  Contributed by Owen.

author: fhanik
msg: no need to synchronize on a get

author: rhillegas
msg: DERBY-1238: Kristian's derby-1238-1a.diff patch, adding createStruct() and createArray(). I also wired Knut Anders' VerifySignatures test into the jdbc40 suite because now it passes cleanly.
